title: r/Choosingbeggars RETURN THE STUFF I STOLE FROM YOU!
description:
r/Choosingbeggars In today's episode, OP's Minecraft account gets hacked, and some kid buys the account. After OP recovers the account, the kid actually has the audacity to email OP and demand to have the account back! He actually says that he deserves the account back because he earned it by stealing it. How entitled and deluded can you possibly be?

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9wno3IFwINk
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
